title: Scallops in their shells with fennel and herbs
description: For a special presentation the scallops are put back in their shells with a fennel and white wine sauce and sealed in with puff pastry.
ingredients: 250g/9oz very cold butter, cut into small cubes
2 sticks wild fennel or ½ bulb fennel
1 plum tomato, skinned, seeds removed and chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
